data.event: His mansion, a fine large house was completely destroyed by fire in 1874.

event.title: was wrested from him by the Peshva after the rebellion of Yemaji Shivdev Mutalik in 1750

data.event: The district was assigned to the Pratinidhi by Ram Raja but was wrested from him by the Peshva after the rebellion of Yemaji Shivdev Mutalik in 1750 [ Grant Duff's Marathas Vol. I, 447.].
